title: C-MORE HMI EA9 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of C-MORE HMI EA9 touch screen panels. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the authentication mechanism. The issue is due to insufficient authentication on post-authentication requests. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges to resources normally protected from unauthenticated users.
timeline:
2020-02-10 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-07-07 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2020-11-24 - Advisory Updated
credit: Ta-Lun Yen & Chizuru Toyama of TXOne IoT/ICS Security Research Labs (Trend Micro)
